name: Kejora
description:
“Kejora” is a puzzle-platformer game in which monstrous creatures pursue the titular girl after discovering a terrible secret. She is accompanied by her friends, who can assist her in overcoming obstacles by utilizing their unique abilities and outwit the monsters by setting traps. 

For our future improvement of this game, it would be helpful to us if you can share your thought using the form below.

Thank you!

https://forms.gle/4AQg6HQFv11DD9tH9
